column1:
#slideshow { 
        margin: 50px auto; 
        position: relative; 
        width: 240px; 
        height: 240px; 
        padding: 10px; 
        box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.4); 
    }
        #slideshow > div { 
        position: absolute; 
        top: 10px; 
        left: 10px; 
        right: 10px; 
        bottom: 10px; 
    }
